name: A View of Rice with Two Children
description: This painting is a collaboration between Noy (9 years old), Khamsao (6) and myself. They saw me painting this piece and I let them help me by painting the rice field. This was their first time painting. Noy especially loved it. They come from a poor family in Ban Phonsavan a small Akha village in Mueang District. 100% of the sale of this piece will be used to help the Akha children.
